column5: Gotta love the weather lately... mother nature makes an ice rink in my driveway for me...  Redneck Family Day!!  <object width="425" height="355"><param name="movie" value="
How are you gonna chip all that ice to put into your drink?  Still have the CRV .... and what is the truck?
Great stuff Bud !  We drove on that pulling two sleds and an ATV in the box today. Was fun at times...just good thing nobody was coming as I was sliding on the wrong side of 11 !
Great fun fer shore. I'll guess that the truck is one of dem super duper Ridgelines.
Great stuff TJ. Making the best out of life.

Oh sure...I spend time out there daily shoveling our rink off, flooding it at night to my family can use it maybe 4 days a week for an hour at a time and you get this??? LOL.  That lovely weather pattern on the weekend turned my rink to slush and water....  Looked like a fun day out there TJ!
